title: Codes
body: So, I am a player who recently started playing League of Legends and I had one question. Where is the code section where you put the skin promotion codes? I could not find it in the new shop visual. Help would be very helpful. Thanks!

replies.body:
Happy to help!

1. Click on the orange chest near the top of your client to open the Store
2. Click on the red ["+RP" icon](http://i.imgur.com/4goM0Eh.jpg) with the fist next to it.
3. Select the "Prepaid Cards & Codes" option
4. Enter in your code
5. ENJOY NEW SHINY THINGS

Hope this helps :D Let me know if any of the steps don't make sense and I'll try to break it down further ^_^
